title: Ranked Rewards
body: Just wondering if ill be receiving my ranked rewards this season{{champion:32}}       {{item:3070}}

replies.body: It feels weird to tell a player if they're eligible or not for rewards through a public venue.  Feel free to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can offer context individually through a more private channel.  We'll reply as soon as we can!
